page.title: 12SHOPPING
page.content:
({A QUESTIONNAIRE ON SHOPPING})
1. What do you sell in the shop? {Fresh fruit, groceries, sweets, pop { and cigarettes.} 2. About how many customers do you have in a day? {About two hundred.} 3. Why did you decide to work in a shop? {I enjoy working in a shop and it { gives me great pleasure to meet and { serve people. 4. How many people have you working here, including yourself? {Four.} 5. Are most of your customers local? {Yes.} 6. Do you want to open your shop on Sunday? {N0.} {BRANWEN DAVIES & CATRIN DAVIES
